description: This Java class defines the PriceSnapshot entity for persisting product price data at a specific retailer and time, with annotations for ORM mapping using Jakarta Persistence (JPA).

classes.name: PriceSnapshot
classes.description: Entity class representing a snapshot of product price at a retailer at a certain time, including ORM mappings and fields.

methods.name: PriceSnapshot
methods.description: Constructor initializing price snapshot with product, retailer, and price.
